item.title: IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21: Online Application Active For 134 Specialist Officers
item.dc:creator: Sohel
item.description: IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21: IDBI Bank Ltd. has recently released an official notification for the posts of Specialist Officers in IDBI Bank on 23rd December 2020. The online application will be active from 24th December 2020 to 07th January 2021. The interested and eligible candidates can apply for the recruitment from the direct link mentioned […]
item.content:encoded:
IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21: IDBI Bank Ltd. has recently released an official notification for the posts of Specialist Officers in IDBI Bank on 23rd December 2020. The online application will be active from 24th December 2020 to 07th January 2021. The interested and eligible candidates can apply for the recruitment from the direct link mentioned below in the article. Candidates must check all the important information regarding the IDBI Bank SO 2020-21 before filling the online application form.

IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21: Highlights

IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21: Vacancy Details

IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21: Official Notification PDF

Download the official PDF for the Recruitment of Specialist Cadre Officers FY 2020-21 released by the IDBI bank. The direct link to download the official notification is provided here. Check all the necessary details for the recruitment.

Click to Download IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21- Official Notification

Steps to Apply Online for IDBI Bank SO 2020-21

  • Visit the official website of IDBI bank or click on the direct link mentioned above.
  • Fill all the credentials/information like name, email ID, contact number, etc.
  • Note the provisional registration number and password generated
  • Fill details of the application form and click on the final submit button
  • Pay the online application fee if required.
  • Download the application form for future reference

IDBI Bank SO 2020-21: Apply Online Link

The online application window of IDBI Bank SO 2020-21 has been active from 24th December 2020 to 7th January 2021. The interested candidates are advised to apply online for the Specialist officers vacancies in IDBI bank by clicking the direct link mentioned below

Click to Apply Online For IDBI SO Recruitment 2020-21

Link will be active soon

Application Fee

Candidates have to pay the below application fee to successfully submit the online application form for IDBI Bank SO Recruitment 2020-21:

IDBI Bank SO: Eligibility Criteria

Educational Qualification

  1. DGM (Grade D): Graduate with minimum 55% marks from a recognized university.
  2. AGM (Gr. C): Graduation (B.E./B.Tech) in Electronics and Telecommunication/ Computer Science/Electronics and Electrical/Information Technology/Electronics & Communication OR Graduate with Post Graduation (PG) in MCA from a Recognized University.
  3. Manager (Gr. B): Graduation with B.E./B.Tech) in Electronics & Electrical/Electronics & Telecommunications/Computer Science/Information Technology/Electronics & Communication OR Graduate with Post Graduation in MCA from a Recognized University.
  4. Assistant Manager (AM) (Grade A): Graduation from recognized University. Preference will be given to persons having Fraud Risk Management (FRM) or Cyber Crime related qualification.

Age Limit

Click here for more Bank Jobs 2021

item.title: AEGCL Recruitment 2020: Form Reopen For 341 Manager and Junior Assistant Posts
item.dc:creator: Sohel
item.description: AEGCL Recruitment 2020: Assam Power Distribution Company (APDCL), Assam Electricity Grid Corporation Limited (AEGCL)  has released a notification for the recruitment of the Assistant & Junior Manager @aegcl.co.in. The online application form is available for submission from 09th to 18th December 2020. Eligible and interested candidates can apply for the recruitment in the prescribed format […]
item.content:encoded:
AEGCL Recruitment 2020: Assam Power Distribution Company (APDCL), Assam Electricity Grid Corporation Limited (AEGCL)  has released a notification for the recruitment of the Assistant & Junior Manager @aegcl.co.in. The online application form is available for submission from 09th to 18th December 2020. Eligible and interested candidates can apply for the recruitment in the prescribed format as given below. Check the details, Application Form, and other important details.

Update: The online application is reopened from 24th to 31st December 2020. This is to address the issue of problem faced by candidates in filling the application.

AEGCL Recruitment 2020

Check all the important updates which are to be kept in mind by the interested aspirants who wish to apply for AEGCL Recruitment 2020.

AEGCL Recruitment 2020.Official Notification PDF

AEGCL Recruitment 2020: Important Dates

AEGCL Recruitment Vacancy Details

Candidates can check all the vacancies details in the table below:

AEGCL Recruitment Eligibility Criteria

Educational Qualification

  • Candidates should possess Full-time B.E/B.Tech (Relevant Disciplines) or Diploma course in Engineering from a recognized University/ Institution.

Age Limit

  • Assistant Manager: 21 to 44 Yrs.
  • Junior Manager: 18 to 44 Years

Online Application Fee For AEGCL Recruitment

The Application Fee for AEGCL Recruitment category-wise is tabulated below:

How to Apply for AEGCL Recruitment?

Follow the given steps for AEGCL Recruitment 2020.

  1.  Click the below link to Apply Online for AEGCL Recruitment 2020.
  2. Register by creating a Username and Password.
  3. Go to the Login Page.
  4. Complete the application form by filling in all the details.
  5. credentials, email address, phone number, Education qualifications, and other contact details.
  6. Upload signature, photograph, and required certificates.
  7. Make payment and Submit.
  8. After completely submitting the online applications, the candidates can take a printout of the application.
  9. Save the Application form for future reference.

AEGCL Recruitment Online Application Link

Click on the link given below for the online application for AEGCL Recruitment. The online application is available till 31st December 2020.

AEGCL Recruitment Online Application Form

AEGCL Recruitment Application Form stands invalid if:

  • Providing wrong information in the AEGCL Recruitment Online Application Form.
  • Providing misleading information
  • More than one application form is submitted by one candidate. Only one of the applications will be considered for the final submission.

Stay updated with the website to check the latest notifications of AEGCL Recruitment 2020.

item.title: Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020: Apply Online For 70 Apprentice
item.dc:creator: Sohel
item.description: Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020: Apply Online For 70 Apprentice Posted byManish26th December 202026th December 2020Leave a comment on Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020: Apply Online For 70 Apprentice Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020: Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant has invited online applications for Trainee Apprentice posts @portal.mhrdnats.gov.in. Check […]
item.content:encoded:
Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020: Apply Online For 70 Apprentice

Posted byManish26th December 202026th December 2020Leave a comment on Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020: Apply Online For 70 Apprentice

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020: Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant has invited online applications for Trainee Apprentice posts @portal.mhrdnats.gov.in. Check notice and last date to apply. Candidates who fulfill the eligibility criteria shall apply online from the link provided below. Read the given article for more details.

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment has released the online application of Trainee Apprentice posts. Given below is an overview of Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment 2020.

Download Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Recruitment Official Notification 2020

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Apprentice Vacancy Details

Check the details of vacancies in the table:

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Apprentice Eligibility Criteria

Education Qualification

  • Tech/B.Sc. in Mechanical Engg.: Four years Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical/Industrial/Automobile/Production Engineering from a Recognized University/Institute approved by AICTE.
  • Tech/B.Sc. in Electrical Engg.: Four years Bachelor degree in (i) Electrical/Electronics & Power Engineering or (ii) Combination of any sub stream of Basics streams of Electrical from recognized University/Institute approved by AICTE.
  • Tech/B.Sc. in Electronics Instrumentation/Computer/IT Engg.: Four years Bachelor’s Degree in Instrumentation/Electronics/Electrical & Electronics/ Electronics & Communication/Telecommunication/Computer Science/1.T. Engg. from a Recognized University/Institute approved by AICTE.
  • Diploma in Mechanical Engg.: Full-time regular Diploma in Mechanical/ Industrial/Automobile/Production Engineering from University/Institute recognized by AICTE.
  • Diploma in Electrical Engg.: Full-time regular Diploma in Electrical/Electronics & Power Engineering or a combination of any sub stream of basic streams of Electrical/Electronics from recognized University/Institute.
  • Diploma in Electronics Instrumentation/Computer/IT Engg.: Full time regular Diploma in Instrumentation/Electronics/Electrical & Electronics/Electronics & Communication/Telecommunication/Computer Science/1.T. Engg. from recognized University/Institute.

Age (As of 01st October 2020)

  • Minimum: 15 Years
  • Maximum: 24 Years

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Apprentice Steps to Apply Online

  1. Click on the link that is given below.
  2. The candidates will have to first themselves.
  3. Then a registration no. and a password will be provided.
  4. Log in and complete the application form.
  5. Fill in all the details.
  6. Upload the documents in the required format size and format.
  7. Finally submit the application form online.
  8. Take a print out of the application form for future reference.

Apprentice Online Application

The online application is available till 14th January 2021.

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Apprentice Online Application Form

Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Apprentice Online Application Form stands invalid if:

  • Providing wrong information in the application form
  • Providing misleading information
  • More than one application form is submitted by one candidate. Only one of the applications will be considered for the final submission.
  • Non-submission of application fee
  • The submission of the Indian Railway Rail Wheel Plant Apprentice Recruitment by post is not acceptable.

Till then you can view other Govt. Job Notifications.
